DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Only _IfcStyledItem_'s (or subtypes) are allowed as members in the list of _Items_, inherited from _IfcRepresentation_. > <small><font color="#FF0000">IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New where rule to ensure the usage for material definition representations, and other non-shape representations </font></small>
